original_text: And Moses stretched out his hand over the sea; and the Lord caused the sea to go back by a strong east wind all that night, and made the sea dry land, and the waters were divided.
korean_text: 모세가 바다 위로 손을 내밀매 여호와께서 큰 동풍이 밤새도록 바닷물을 물러가게 하시니 물이 갈라져 바다가 마른 땅이 된지라

sentences.original_text: And Moses stretched out his hand over the sea
and the Lord caused the sea to go back
by a strong east wind all that night
and made the sea dry land
